column1: back of a length and swings back in a touch, draws an inside edge and rolls away to the leg side
back of a length on the hips, gentle loosener from Steyn. Imam picks it away fine on the leg side for four
back of a length and zipping away outside off, no shot offered
much fuller and on a fourth-stump line, Imam presses forward and inside-edges it away to the leg side
on a length and slanting away outside off, Imam is late to abort his shot and pull his bat away. An outside edge streaks away to third man
banged in short and outside off, Fakhar ignores it
slides on with the arm outside off, fizzes off the pitch as Imam plays inside the line and is beaten on the outside edge
tossed outside off, Imam reaches the pitch of this ball and drives a single down to long-on
slower through the air on off, no turn either way yet with the new ball, dead-batted
pushed through flatter and faster outside off, 95ks, run away to point
dipping full-toss on leg stump, dragged to midwicket
looped up on off, full, Fakhar presses forward and drives to mid-off
short of a length and slanting across off, 138ks, ignored
short of a length and outside off, 138ks again, no shot again

Steyn bounces out Imam! Steyn runs in hard, hits the pitch harder, 139ks. Banged in short and angling away outside off, Imam is rushed into a hook against the angle. It gets too big on him. Imam can only splice it off a top-edge into the lap of deep third man.
another lifter from Steyn, pings Fakhar on the helmet. Ouch! It gets too big again and thumps him flush on the badge. Fakhar doesn't flinch, though
much fuller and wider outside off, allows Fakhar to free his arms. Flayed through the cover-point region
back of a length, starts outside off and seams away further, Babar doesn't go after this
lobs a full-toss on off or just a shade outside off, swatted down to long-on
Tahir lobs another lose full-toss outside off. Babar sizes it up and creams it through the covers. Bent knee, high elbow and all that jazz...
full and dips on leg stump, Babar does not get to the pitch and jabs it away to the midwicket region
flatter and just a shade outside off, hit to mid-off
wrong'un but Tahir drops it short and wide outside off, chopped off the back foot to backward point
follows the wrong'un with a legbreak. The length is short as well, whipped off the hips to deep midwicket off the back foot
on a length and angling across off, Fakhar throws his bat at the ball and lashes it to the right of mid-off
Steyn hits 140ks but strays on the pads of Babar. This half-volley is picked off through midwicket. As easy as eating a sandwich
on a length and straightens late, takes the outside edge and rolls down to deep third man
short and on leg stump, cramps Fakhar for room, but he manages to secure a single to long leg
on a length and on a fourth-stump line, 139ks, Babar gets right behind the line and defends to cover
shorter and outside off, glides it off the face to backward point off the back foot
pretty full and outside off, forward and stabbed back to Rabada
shorter and outside off, lashed to cover off the back foot
short on middle, 143ks, defended back to the bowler
back of a length and attacking the stumps, defensively played back to the bowler
short and on leg stump, Fakhar swivels on the back foot and hastily jabs a pull to the fine leg boundary
short and outside off, Fakhar short-arms it away straight to mid-on
Babar rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and fetches a single to third man
short, wide, 140ks, Steyn's pace works in Fakhar's favour. He loves it there, more so at pace. Smeared over backward point for four
more pace, 142ks, more width from Steyn. Fakhar throws his hands at the ball and slashes it away in the gap at point. Hits it with a slicing motion for back-to-back fours
short on the hips, worked away from the crease to the left of midwicket
short on middle, defended back to Steyn
whoa! That's a regal shot, Babar. On a length and outside off, this isn't a half-volley by any means. Babar stands tall and punches it past the right of Steyn. Class written all over it
fuller and angling across off, 142ks, the bat turns in his hands as he drags it off the inside half to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, 146ks, Fakhar gives himself some room and flays it away past the right of Mulder at backward point

edged and dropped by Amla at slip. He shells a fairly regulation catch. On a length and moves away outside off, 146ks, Fakhar simply throws his hands at the ball and edges it. Pops straight in and straight out. Poor Rabada has his hands on his head
Rabada responds with an angry bouncer outside off, Fakhar rocks his head out of the way
fuller and outside off, Fakhar tips it to the covers
Fakhar rides the bounce of this 139ks short ball outside off and plays it with soft hands to gully
short and outside off, 140ks, Babar stands tall and flat-bats it to extra-cover on the up
slower cutter from Dale Steyn, rolls past the outside edge as the batsman does not pick the change-up
another offcutter from Steyn, kicks up at the glove. Babar loosens his grip and fends it off
there comes the bouncer, 140ks, but it's too short and has been called a wide
worked off the pads to the midwicket region
dug in short and outside off, rushes Fakhar into a hook. Spliced over midwicket and he gets away with it
looks like the slower offcutter, again, this time to the left-hander, run away to point with soft hands
on a length and outside off, 144ks, Fakhar doesn't care. He stands up tall and thumps it on the up to the right of Rabada for four
on a length and snakes away outside off, Fakhar shows caution and lets this one go
on a length and outside off, angled out to backward point
short and Rabada hits the bat as opposed to bat hitting ball. Squirted away to cover-point
back of a length and angling across off, Fakhar presses forward, he's still on the move while meeting the ball. Stabbed away to the covers
Fakhar stays leg-side of this short ball outside off and runs it away in front of square on the off side for one
back of a length and skidding away outside off, tapped to cover-point off the back foot
pitched up and outside off, pumped to mid-on off the front foot
slower offcutter, loses all the fizz after hitting the pitch, squirted away to point
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and finds a single to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, hangs back and stabs it away to the left of point
back of a length and outside off, barely 130ks, Babar has all the time in the world to turn his wrists and pick it away to the right of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, 138ks, punches on the up with an open face to point
short on off, hangs back and blocks
back of a length on middle, stabbed back to the bowler
another regal on-drive from Babar. On a length and outside off, he leans into this and punchily strokes it straight of mid-on
overpitched and outside off, 144ks, leans into another drive, this is struck to deep cover
banged in short at the body, nearly 140ks, too quick forr Fakhar as he does not connect with a pull
pitched up and outside off, whipped away past the right of mid-on
dug in short and aimed for the chest, fended away to the leg side
pitched further up and outside off, Fakhar stabs it back to the bowler
banged in short on middle, short-arm flapped away towards square leg

The leg stump goes cartwheeling. What a sight for a fast bowler. Babar jumps too far across off, exposes his leg stump, and loses it. Pretorius hits a hard length and hits the leg stump. Babar simply shuffled across and missed the flick. Just when these two were looking to kick into a higher gear, Pretorius breaks the stand

back of a length and outside off, gets behind the line and punches to covers. Faf turns around  and hits the stumps at the non-striker's end but Hafeez is in. They get another run thanks to the ricochet
very full on middle, 146ks, cracked hard but straight back to Rabada
back of a length, Fakhar hangs back and works it away to the midwicket region
chest-high short ball on leg stump, swivels on the back foot and pulls to fine leg
full and angling into a leg-side flick to mid-on
short and keeps coming into Hafeez, he rocks his head out of the way and ignores this lifter
inswinging yorker, 145ks, pace like fire, but Hafeez jams his bat down and keeps it out
short on the hips, nudged away through backward square leg for a double
back of a length and outside off, slow off the pitch, Fakhar delays his back-foot punch to mid-off
back of a length on middle and leg, Fakhar shakes his head after mis-hitting a drive between midwicket and mid-on
hip-high short ball on off stump, swatted away off the back foot to long leg
explodes from a length outside off and surprises Hafeez. He loosens his grip and fends it to backward point's left
back of a length on middle, Fakhar stands up tall and crisply punches down the ground, straight of mid-on for four. Shot
shot, Professor! Matching each other shot for shot, eh? This was overpitched and outside off, though. Hafeez leans into it and creams a cover drive
good length and outside off, Hafeez gets forward and dabs it away to point
jumps from a length outside off and cramps the batsman for room. Jabbed away to the off side off the back foot
nice and full on off stump, forward and defensively bunted to the covers
full on off, defended to mid-on off the front foot
Hafeez rises up and punches a short ball from outside off to square third man in the deep
here comes Hafeez: down the track and belted away to mid-on
short and outside off, rides it out to backward point
tip and run in front of cover. Smart running between the wickets
back of a length and outside off, goes on the back foot and punches up to extra cover
lifter outside off, ducks under it
chest-high short ball on middle, Hafeez splices a pull over midwicket
length ball on off stump from Steyn, and Fakhar tries to push at this away from his body. Takes a thick outside edge, and flies past the vacant slip-cordon to third man
length ball just outside off stump, right on the fourth-stump line, and defended away to cover off the front foot
back of a length just outside off, and he rides the bounce to pull. But it's come off the bat's top-half, and rolls away to mid-on instead
back of a length on off, and he pulls this along the ground to Phehlukwayo in the deep. Enough time to trod across for a single
back of a length on leg stump, but the ball doesn't bounce as much. Fakhar quickly swivels, and hammers a pull to deep backward square
length ball, wide outside off, but seaming away after hitting the deck. Tiptoes to cut the ball through point, but under-edges the shot right onto the deck. Ball goes nowhere

starts off with the slower ball. Offcutter on middle, and angling away from Fakhar. Enough time for him to adjust, and he transfers his body weight onto the front foot, before punching straight past the bowler for a beautiful straight four
through him! Full just outside off, and he tries to slap this square through the off side. Ball stays slightly low, and sneaks under his bat to QdK
full on off, and angling away once again. Fakhar tries to hammer this through the covers once again, but the lack of bounce forces him to miss once again
length ball, wide outside off, and he waits for the ball to get to him before cutting to deep point
back of a length on middle, and he quickly goes onto the back foot to punch with the straight bat
length ball angling into the right-hander, and worked off his hips to deep backward square. He'll keep strike
full just outside off, and he prods forward to defend with soft hands. Smothered away to the leg side
full just outside off stump, and defended into the gap on the off side for a quick single
full, slightly wide outside off, and he presses forward to drive through the covers. Well struck, but there's protection at deep extra cover
back of a length just outside off, and he allows the ball to come to him, before slapping a square drive through to third man. Thick outside edge in that case

full on middle, and he hammers this straight to mid on. Du Plessis at mid-on gets a hand to it, and Tahir (at mid-off) tries to stop the ball thereafter, but Tahir has over-run it, and the ball dribbles away to the long-off boundary. Fifty for Fakhar and hundred for Pakistan
full on off, and check-driven to mid off
full on leg stump, and whipped over the square-leg umpire! Man in the deep runs across from deep midwicket, but his sliding effort just isn't good enough
full outside off, and he clobbers a mistimed drive to point for a quick single. Hendricks' throw at the bowler's end hits Fakhar's right wrist and he needs some medical treatment. Ouch!
full just outside off stump, and defended away off the front foot to cover
Phehlukwayo goes short as Hafeez skips down the ground. Cramped for space, but still attempts to pull, and that's been gloved right into the keeper's gloves. No hesitation from the umpire either
length ball, wide outside off, and steered off the back foot to deep point for two. De Kock tries to guide the ball onto his stumps, but can't get the direct hit
full just outside off stump, and driven with the bat's open face. Intercepted by cover
back of a length on middle, from round the wicket. Comfortably pulled along the ground to deep backward square

back of a length on off, and gets big on the batsman. Nudges it off his pads to the leg side, and Shoaib says 'no' to the single. Fakhar was 1/3rd down the wicket already before being forced to turn back
full on off, and he drives with the bat's closed face. Falls short of the fielder at mid-on, as the batsmen scamper across for a single
check-pulled but falls safe of deep midwicket. Length ball angling into his body from round the wicket, and chipped over the infield on this occasion
length ball, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to tap a back-foot shot to cover
length ball angling into his body, and he guides a back-foot shot - off his hips - to fine leg for one
full on off, and angling inwards. Flicked off his pads to the fielder at midwicket
full on off, and he offers the bat's straight face to drive down the ground. Well stopped by mid-on this time
back of a length on middle, but soaring over Malik's shoulders. Umpire says 'wide'
length ball on off, and worked off his hips to square leg this time. Using his wrists to steer this shot behind square
length ball on his pads again, and tucked off his pads to fine leg with the bat's closed face. They jog across for one
back of a length outside leg stump, and he tries to pull this square. But the ball has been heavily gloved and QdK's diving effort to his right isn't good enough either. Ball rolls away for four

inside-edged onto his pads as the ball rolls away to point. They scamper across for a single. This was a full ball on middle that was too close to Fakhar's body for the cut... but he went for it anyway
length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a punch to cover for a quick single
length ball, just outside off stump, and he tries to defend with the straight bat. But the ball moves away slightly, and takes the outside edge to third man
full just outside off, and driven away from his body. Sliced to cover this time
hammered! Length ball on middle, and he swivels to pull this past the fielder at deep square leg! No chance for the man there as Fakhar rolls his wrists over this shot
back of a length from round the wicket. Lands on middle stump, and Fakhar fends off the back foot
back of a length on off again, and Fakhar backs away to cut. But too close to his body, and under-edged towards the off side
full ball just outside off, but coming into off stump. Shoaib covers his off stump, before defending with soft hands
full on middle, and driven with the bat's closed face between mid-on and midwicket. Well intercepted by the fielder running to his right
length ball on middle, and he mistimes a shot towards the bowler. Attempts to slap a cut actually, but the ball was way too close to his chest for that shot
length ball on middle, and he defends the ball from near his face. Ball rolls back to the bowler

short ball on middle, top-edged and taken at deep fine leg! Tahir takes a catch near the boundary rope as Fakhar mistimes a pull, but he stumbles backwards slightly while completing the catch, and the umpires want to see if his back leg has touched the rope. It's mighty close.. i'll tell you that. Nifty footwork from Tahir to recover after losing his balance.. but he's managed to keep his heel inside the ropes. Any ballet dancer would be proud of that effort, Fakhar falls for 70
full on middle, and nudged off his pads to the vacant square-leg region for a quick single. Pakistan 128 for 4 at the halfway mark
full just outside off, and tapped straight past the non-striker's right to mid-on. No chance of a single
back of a length just outside off, and he tiptoes to defend away to point. Ball dribbles away to the fielder
length ball just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover this time
low full toss just outside off, and he slices a drive towards the leg side. Balll rolls away to deep midwicket, as they come back for the second run
length ball on middle, but going down the leg side. Malik does well to get his hips out of the ball's way. Allows Pakistan to collect a free run
back of a length on middle, and nudged off his waist to square leg
full just outside off, and swinging inwards slightly. He shuffles across before driving straight towards the non-striker, but Rabada palms it away on his followthrough
slower ball to kickstart the over. Full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket with ease
full ball, once again a slower one from Phehluwayo. Wide outside off, so he's forced to reach at it. Driven to cover point
full on off stump, and he shuffles forward to defend. Straight back to Phehlukwayo
extra bounce! Length ball outside off, and Rizwan tries to cut, but some extra zip forces the delivery to whizz past his bat's outside edge
hammered to get off the mark. Length ball, wide outside off, and he drags a pull to deep midwicket
full on middle, and turning away. And defended straight back to the bowler
full on off, and worked away - off his toes - to midwicket
tossed up wide outside off stump, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
length ball on off stump, and he rocks back to punch
full just outside off, and he looks to defend towards the off side
wrong un! Nice one to end the over. Full outside off, but turning inwards... but Rizwan carefully defends
back of a length outside off stump, and he drags to pull along the ground to mid-on. Flat-batted this time
full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend back to the bowler
full and wide outside off, and he bends forward to meet the ball on the full. Creams a drive to deep extra cover
full just outside off, but he runs down the ground and hammers a shot past the bowler's left right for four!
length ball just outside off, and he covers his off stump to defend back to the bowler
full on middle, and he whips a shot towards the leg side. Well struck, but straight to midwicket
full on leg stump, and defended right back to the bowler off the front foot
flatter one, lands wide outside off and turns into the batsman. He rocks back, makes room, and then cuts square to deep point
length ball on off, and turning inwards. Defended off the back foot after backing away to the leg side

full on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. This is another slider and Rizwan has missed the shot. Ball goes past his inside-edge, and hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw but not given by the umpire. Tahir convinces Du Plessis to review. What does ball tracking say? Pitches in line...check. Impact on leg stump...check... but the ball is going over the stumps! South Africa lose a review
full on off, and the wrong'un is met with the batsman skipping down the ground. Driven towards the leg side for a single on this occasion
full on middle, and worked down the ground - with the turn - to the leg side

another lbw appeal but not given! Full on middle, and angling into his pads. Batsman misses the flick off his pads, and it hits his front leg. Impact's outside leg stump...so clearly missing the stumps. Umpire Brathwaite is spot on
full on off stump, and defended off the front foot to cover. Slices the shot this time, in fact
full just outside off, and he drives down the ground to mid off. Phehlukwayo's left hand slows the ball's pace before the fielder behind him intercepts
length ball, just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run this shot down to short third man
full on middle stump, and worked off his pads to the leg side
full on middle, and he works this of his pads to fine leg for a walking single. Also time for drinks
looped up on the leg stump, Rizwan forces it to midwicket with the wrists
wrong'un on the pads, clipped away through square leg off the back foot
straighter one on middle and leg, 90ks, bunted down to long-on
slides in on middle, from wide of the crease, dead-batted back to the bowler
tossed outside off, Rizwan stays leg-side of the ball and crunches it straight to short cover
full and attacking the stumps, 93ks, Rizwan drags the flipper to short fine leg

here comes Rizwan: down the track, goes for an almighty heave-ho across the line. He winds up top-edging it to de Kock behind the stumps. Seeing Rizwan venture down the track, Pretorious digs it short and wide outside off. He asks the batsman to reach out for the ball and hit it. Rizwan can't get enough bat onto it and nicks off. He simply couldn't get going today. He falls for a painstaking 10 off 30 balls
full and angling into the middle of Shadab's front-foot defence
Pretorious hits a hard length outside off, Shadab adjusts and steers off the face to point
on a length and outside off, guided off the face to point again
just short of a good length and outside off, Shadab stands tall and punches back to the bowler
fuller on off, squeezed away to mid-on off the front foot
skids on outside off, leans back and chops it away to the left of short cover
flighted outside off, cracked to mid-off off the front foot
tossed on middle, driven back to Tahir's right
hint of turn for Tahir, poked off the outside half to point for one
full on off, blocked off the front foot
short on middle and leg, punched down to long-on off the back foot
banged in short and outside off, Malik jumps off the ground, drops the ball into the infield on the off side, and hares across to the other end
shortish and on top of off, stabbed back to the bowler
back of a length and angling into a bunt to the right of short midwicket
Malik swivels on the back foot and expertly controls a pull off a chest-high short ball on off. Hit to deep square leg
short and outside off, run away to point
banged in short and outside off, Shadab takes it on with a pull. Spliced over midwicket
pushed through on off, defended off the front foot to cover
slower through the air and dips on middle, defended back from the crease by Malik
dragged down on middle, pulled only as far as Rassie van der Dussen at square leg
full-toss outside off, slapped straight to extra-cover off the front foot
quicker and spins away outside off, tapped with the break to the left of extra-cover this time
dragged down on leg stump, possibly a googly, Malik picks the length up in a flash. He rocks back and pummels a pull past the left of Rassie van der Dussen at square leg
very full on middle and leg, forward and clipped away to the right of midwicket
short of a length on middle and leg, played back down the pitch
Malik allows this short ball to come into him, then angles it down to third man
slower ball outside off, 111ks, this cutter is knocked away to point
short on off, jabbed away to short cover, where Reeza runs in and swoops down on the ball
drop and run to the point region. They get another run because of a misfield
pushed through on off, eased down to long-off off the front foot
skids on middle, chopped to point from the stumps
really full at off stump, opens the face and guides the ball to cover
slides on outside off, goes on the back foot and chops it away towards backward point

drifts in from wide of the crease, then breaks away outside off past the outside edge, the extra bounce beats de Kock. Was there a tickle onto that? Not quite sure, although Tahir's reaction suggests there was an outside edge
fizzing through outside off, whisked away to point
short, wide outside off, flayed away. Andile slides to his left at sweeper cover and stops the ball. Van der Dussen applauds Andile's effort in the outfield
short and ducks back in, Malik searches for the dab to deep third man. He nearly chops back onto the stumps

the line is much wider, allowing Malik to steer it down to deep third man. There's an awful mix-up between the wickets. Malik nearly runs two, but Shadab had dropped his bat at the striker's end. Malik undoes his steps and is back in time
fullish and just a shade outside off, opens the face and taps it down to deep third man
short on middle, fended away to the leg side for one

banged in short and outside off, spliced over midwicket. Another awful mix-up between the wickets. The TV umpire has been called in. Malik has been caught short. Huge blow for Pakistan in a crunch game. Malik was keen on the second, Shadab not quite. Steyn had swooped down on the ball, throwing to Pretorious. The bowler then threw it to the keeper to get Malik
flighted on middle and leg, worked away to midwicket

Tahir pins Shadab in front and sets off for a celebratory run. Pause the celebrations. Shadab calls for a review. This looks like a topspinner, slides on straighter and bouncer more. Was it bouncing over the stumps? Yes, the tracker confirms it and the review saves Shadab
flatter on middle and leg, laced down to long-on off the front foot
full and breaks away outside off, this googly is driven to extra cover
faster and on the pads, tucked away to deep midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, tapped to long-on off the front foot
short and angling into middle, leans back and drops the ball to the right of de Kock behind the stumps
shorter and outside off, rides it out behind point for one
back of a length and outside off, glided to point
flicked off the pads to deep square leg
Imad shuffles across off and nudges to midwicket. Where're you going Shadab? He is sent back by Imad
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to point
skidder on top of off, goes on the back foot and punches to the covers
full and breaks away outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
Tahir drops a short legbreak outside off, spins away further, cracked off the back foot past point
short and spins away outside off, stabbed away to point
high full-toss on middle, slapped away to long-on. Tahir puts his hand up in apology. It was above the waistline, but not called a no-ball

edged and sneaks away past Amla at slip. Googly, breaks away outside off, tempts Imad into a pokey drive. Takes the outside edge, but Amla can't get a hand onto it as the ball rolls away to the boundary
short and outside off, crashed away to point. Can't get it past Reeza there
back of a length and keeps low outside off, as he cuts.. and misses
wide of the crease, slants in and snakes away past the outside edge
shuffles across and works a single to midwicket

Imad races down the track, the bowler bangs it short and looks to cramp him for room. No problem says Imad as he belts it away to the right of short midwicket and left of Faf at mid-on. It outruns Faf to the boundary
short, wide outside off, scythed on the up over backward point
slower ball on off, Imad tries to manufacture his own pace. He steps out and slices it up and over mid-off
short and shoved down the leg side, pulled off the back foot to long leg
slower short ball outside off, leans back and forces it to cover-point
short on the hips, pulled down to long leg. 200 up for Pakistan

Pulled straight into the lap of Rassie van der Dussen at short midwicket. Hip-high short ball outside off, comes off slow off the pitch, Shadab looks to manufacture his own pace again. He pulls it hard but straight to short midwicket. Rassie hangs onto the fast-travelling ball. First wicket on international return for Mulder
short and Mulder whangs a short ball down leg. Wide
short, wide, whisked away to point
full and floated down leg for another wide, this time Andile is the culprit
short of a length and attacking the top of middle, played back to the bowler
on a length on middle, Imad clears his front leg and smears it away to long-on
short, wide outside off, flashed in the air over backward point. Third man mops it up in the deep
rib-high short ball on middle, Imad rolls out his wrists and pulls to long leg
very full on leg stump, gives himself some room and hits down the ground
lifter outside off, too high and Andile has to re-bowl it
Imad dances down the track and toe-ends a slower, short ball from outside off to cover-point
back of a length on the hips, clipped away off the back foot to midwicket
short and attacking middle, Amir covers up in defence
Amir gives himself some room and cracks it from the stumps to the off-side sweeper
on a length and jags back in, little cutter from Rabada, beats the inside edge and bounces over the stumps
friendly full-toss outside off, instead of putting it away Amir misses it altogether
short and following the moving batsman. Amir backs away and drops the ball to the cover region
back of a length and outside off, cut away to Mulder at sweeper cover
slower ball on off, forced away to mid-off

Van der Dussen runs across to his right from deep midwicket, but the ball swirls further away him and drops into no-man's land. Rassie also lost his balance and toppled over. He has a wry smile on his face. Short and angling away outside off, he dares to hook against the angle and gets away
short and outside off, flat-batted down to mid-off
banged in short and wide outside off, Imad ramps it down to third man
full-toss on middle, hit down to long-on
slower short ball, finishes on the hips, picked away to long leg
short and skids back in to catch the thigh guard and roll away to point
short and heading down leg, helped away to fine leg off the back foot
Amir gives himself a lot of room, but Rabada executes the wide yorker and beats the bat
pinpoint yorker from Rabada, and it floors the off stump. Rabada hits the blockhole from around the wicket, angling in and tails away late to beat the outside edge and smash the stump
bouncer on middle, angling in from around the wicket, Afridi ducks under it
starts off with a slower full ball outside off, right in Imad's swinging arc. He has a roundhouse swipe at it and sends it into the stands beyond long-on
Steyn now goes full and wide outside off. Imad throws his bat at the ball and scythes it away to sweeper cover for just a single
banged in short and outside off, Afridi swings for the hills now. The Afridi might have connected. This Afridi doesn't quite
lifter outside off, Afridi aims to run it down to third man. But it gets too big on him and thuds into the gloves of de Kock
Afridi clears his front leg, swipes and only collects thin air again. Steyn continues to hit a hard length and make life difficult for Afridi
back of a length and outside off, 141ks, Afridi has another heave-ho and yes you guessed it right. He misses it
full and wide outside off, backs away and hits it to sweeper cover with a slicing motion
back of a length and slanting in on middle, Imad now hoicks and does not make contact with the white ball
slower short ball outside off, Rabada rolls his fingers across this, hacked down to long-on
banged in short and outside off, Imad, having farmed the strike, finally connects well enough. Top-edged over the keeper's head for a one-bounce four
shorter and outside off, swatted down the ground and Imad hares back for the second. Rabada didn't collect the ball cleanly. Had he collectedly it properly, Afridi would have been out

Imad wraps up the innings with an eye-catching six over long-off! Rabada searches for a middle-stump yorker, it comes out as a full-toss. Imad gives himself some room, clears his front leg, yet maintains a stable base and launches it over the boundary. He holds his shape and rightly so
full on middle, and sliding into leg stump. De Kock tries to drive towards mid-on, but he's inside-edged this onto his pads. Soft appeal for lbw, but Usman withdraws
length ball outside off, but sliding inwards again. The cover-drive takes the bat's inside half and rolls away to midwicket
round the wicket to Hash. Length ball outside off, and angling into his body. Worked off his pads to the leg side for a quick single
full just outside off, and he leans forward to drive through the covers. Struck well, but straight to cover
full just outside off again, and the cover drive can't beat the infield
length ball, just wide outside off, and the front-foot punch through the off side can't pierce the infield

length ball on leg stump, and the ball shows some late movement down the leg side. Amla tries to flick, and misses, and that forces the keeper to dive to his right and intercept. Soft appeal from the bowler for caught-behind, but there was no contact off the bat
length ball on middle, and too close to Amla's body for the punch through 45 (cover). The ball hits his inside half, and rolls away towards midwicket
full on off stump, and he taps this towards the leg-side off the front foot. They scamper across for one
full just outside off, and Amla stands tall to steer a back-foot punch to point. Excellent stop from Shadab to ensure it's a dot
full just outside off stump, and he quickly steps onto the front foot to drive. Mistimed to mid-off this time
length ball, wide outside off and angling further away. Allows Amla to throws his hands at it, but the square-drive can't beat the infielder
slapped! Length ball going away from Amla, and he lets the ball come to him, before guiding a back-foot cut past the diving Shadab at point
back of a length outside off, width offered and QdK chases after it. Looks to hammer a square cut, but can't make contact
what a shot! Over midwicket. Full just outside off, but de Kock spots the length early and swings across the line. Nails a slog to the leg-side boundary
overpitched, very full wide outside off, and QdK tries to dig this away to the off side. Instead it takes the bat's inside-edge, flies past leg stump, and runs down to the fine-leg boundary

sliced and taken at cover! Back of a length outside off, and de Kock tries to pull this from outside off stump. Extra bounce forces him to fluff the shot, and the lobbed shot goes to Hafeez. Pakistan celebrate but the umpire wants QdK to wait. They want to check for the front-foot no-ball... and Usman has overstepped! And now it's neither a wicket nor a dot ball. One extra run for the no-ball, and now we have a free-hit. How much will this hurt Pakistan?
full and wide outside off, and Qdk muscles a cover drive over the infield. Ball clears cover, but doesn't have the legs to find the boundary
length ball, just outside off, and steered off the front foot to point
length ball, wide outside off and angling into off stump. Guided off the back foot to Shadab at point
length ball wide outside off stump. Amla chases it, trying to cut, but the extra bounce takes the ball over his bat
length ball just outside off, and he plays a deft late-cut down to third man
length ball just outside off, but coming into QdK. Tries to punch, but he rams the shot right into the deck. Ball rolls away to the off side
full on middle stump, and caressed through the leg side! Steps forward to get his front leg to the pitch of the ball, and then drives past mid-on's left for four
full on middle, and going down the leg side as de Kock misses a swipe towards fine leg
full on middle and the cover drive does not come off the bat's middle. Flies off the outside edge to the off side once again
back of a length on off, and he defends off the back foot towards cover point
full just outside off stump from round the wicket. He presses forward to defend towards cover
length ball on middle, and comfortably clipped off his pads to the leg side. Can't find the gap though
full, and wide outside off, and Amla bends his knees to clobber a square cut past point. But there's protection in the deep

drilled! Full on off, and de Kock puts his front foot past off stump to get inside the line of the ball. Simply offers the bat's straight face thereafter, and that shot has four written all over it once it beats the bowler
full and wide outside off, and the back-foot drive takes the bat's inside-half. Rolls away to the leg side instead
length ball, just wide outside off, and steered off the back foot to point
falls just short of mid off! Fullish ball just outside off, and he's shoveled a cover drive nearly into the hands of the fielder
full outside off, and this time Amla makes on mistake. Spots the length early, and lifts a drive straight over cover
full on middle, and that's been defended off the front foot to mid-on
length ball on leg stump, and comfortably clipped off his hips to deep backward square. Calls for two early, and easily completed by Amla
back of a length just outside off, and a classic back-foot punch from Amla. Finds cover
edged! The change of angle does the trick. Full just outside off again, and the ball doesn't come in this time. Holds its line as Amla tries to drive, and it's taken a feather-touch to Rizwan
back of a length outside off, and getting big on de Kock. Punched with the bat's open face to deep point
length ball, wide outside off stump from round the wicket. Hendricks chooses to shoulder his arms
length ball, just outside off, and he covers his off stump to defend off the back foot
length ball outside off stump, and Hendricks steps across the stumps before defending off the back foot again
length ball outside off stump, and Hendricks opens his stance to tap a shot off the back foot to the leg side
length ball, just outside off stump again, and comfortably punched off the back foot to cover point
slower ball, full on off, and mistimed to the leg side. Looked to drive straight, but was through his shot too early
full on middle, and he clips this off his toes to deep midwicket. They want a second, but sharp work in the deep ensures it's just a single
full on off stump, and defended with gentle hands off the front foot. Ball rolls back to the bowler
full on middle, another offcutter from Shaheen. Turned off his toes to the leg side on this occasion
back of a length on off, and he tiptoes to pull. Played along the ground to midwicket
length ball just outside off, and he plays a back-foot punch off the back foot, and the ball beats the fielder at point! No stopping that
hammered! Width offered, full outside off, and he plays an exquisite square drive through the covers!
back of a length outside off stump, from round the wicket. But not that it changes anything. Hendricks rides the bounce, and punches off the back foot, and the ball is hit wide enough of point
length ball, just outside off stump, and blocked off the front foot
length ball, slower outside off stump. Allows the ball to come towards him, before steering a late dab to third man
gloved but falls short of short fine leg. Length ball angling down leg and he tries to pull. But not the best contact off the bat
length ball just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to midwicket. They pinch a single
full on off, and he shovels a straight drive down to long off for a walking single
full on leg stump, and chipped over midwicket! Long-on tries to run around the boundary, but he simply chaperones the ball to the boundary rope
length ball on off, but turning into middle stump. Fended off the back foot to the off side
length ball on middle, and turned off his hips to square leg off the back foot
full on leg stump, and the straight-drive takes an inside edge. Ball rolls past Hafeez at square leg, and the professor gives the ball a mighty chase
length ball, wide outside off, and slapped off the back foot to point
length ball on middle, and angling down leg. Nudged off his hips to deep backward square for a walking single
full just outside off, and he sticks his bat out to defend. But the ball takes an outside edge, and flies past the fielder at first slip! Hendricks very lucky
length ball on middle, and he allows the ball to get to him, before guiding a back-foot steer to point
full on middle, and defended off the front foot. Intercepted by Amir on his followthrough
length ball on leg stump, and worked off his hips to the leg side
length ball on middle, and worked away to the leg side again. Wide enough of midwicket, and they manage to pinch a single
flatter, lands on middle and skids through. But Hendricks does well to use the crease's depth; he pulls to midwicket
reverse swept to deep point. Was full on leg stump, and he plays a pre-meditated shot on this occasion
length ball, just outside off, and he smokes a back-foot cut (despite the ball staying low) to deep point

reverse swept through the keeper and first slip! Cheeky batting. The fielder at first slip was running to his left anticipating that de Kock would sweep square, but he instead plays it fine, and goes right through the region where first slip was standing at the start of the ball
reverse swept a third time! Full on leg, and swept to deep point once more
full just outside off, and tapped away off the front foot to point. Gentle hands allow them to scamper across for a single
length ball angling across the right-hander, and he executes a perfect square-cut off the back foot. Well timed, but Imam's diving effort at deep point saves the boundary
full on middle, and the leg-side defense takes a leading edge to deep extra cover instead!
full toss on leg stump, and comfortably clipped away to Imam at deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, but no real pace on offer. He waits for the ball to get to him, before punching to cover
back of a length on leg stump, and Hendricks takes his eyes off the ball while trying to hook. Cue-ends the shot, and it's in the air for a lil bit.. but it lands short of midwicket
length ball on off, and he tiptoes to pull along the ground to deep backward square
back of a length on leg, and turning down the leg side. But he nudges it fine to short fine leg for a single
full just outside off, and turning further away. Tapped away to cover this time
deposited over long-on! Full on off, extra flight from Shadab, but he picks the legbreak well, and smashes this against the turn for half-a-dozen
full on middle, and defended with the bat's open face to cover for a single
half-tracker on leg stump, and QdK goes deep into his crease, before swiveling a pull very very fine
full on off stump, and he presses forward to push the ball to mid-on
length ball on middle, and worked off his pads past the fielder at midwicket
length ball on leg stump, and he clips this fine to the man in the deep. Hundred for South Africa
length ball on middle, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge this time. Falls near cover
back of a length outside off, and he throws his hands at this. The attempted cut has been toe-ended, and Shaheen gets under it at third man. Big wicket
length ball just outside off, and he tries to play a cut that's too close to his body. Misses the shot
full on middle, and the front-foot drive is drilled towards mid-on. They take off for a dangerous single
Fifty for De Kock and Faf taps gloves with him. Legbreak, spinning into him, whipped with the break through midwicket
tossed outside off and breaks away, stabbed back to the bowler
full and spins away, defended to the covers off the front foot
googly, swerves back in, takes the inside edge and rolls to the leg side
flighted on middle, driven down to mid-off
flighted and outside off, de Kock rolls out a reverse-sweep and swats it away to the third man boundary
shortish and outside off, dinked to point with an open face
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to midwicket
short and outside off, whipped off the back foot to deep square leg
short and outside off, Faf sizes it up and pings the backward square leg boundary. He swivels on the back foot and pulls it away with great authority
banged in short and outside off, Faf ignores it
back of a length and angling into a defensive bunt back to Amir
tossed up and spins away past the outside edge as de Kock plays inside the line of it
shorter and turns away outside off, goes on the back foot and punches through extra-cover
looped outside off, eased to long-on for one
full on leg stump, de Kock steps away and drives inside-out to extra-cover
De Kock dares to step down the track this time, he gets close to the pitch and drives against the break through midwicket
shortish and turns away outside off, forced off the back foot in front of square on the off side
and De Kock welcomes Shinwari back with a mighty six! Short and sits up to be hit, he picks it up and pulls it over the midwicket boundary. Bam!
back of a length and angling into off, closes the face and jabs the ball away to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, de Kock opens the face and dinks it away to deep third man
back of a length and angling in at off, run away behind point
fractionally short and outside off, de Kock thrashes it away to the midwicket fence. He rocks back and middles a pull
even shorter and outside off, effort ball from Shinwari, but the result is a six. It's off a top edge but de Kock won't mind that. Splices a hook and gets six over fine leg
full and holds its line outside off, Faf opens the face and guides it to cover
shorter and turns away outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
flatter and outside leg as de Kock pre-meditates a reverse-sweep and strokes it through point
worked off the pads to midwicket
full and outside off, eased to sweeper cover off the front foot
looped up and outside off, de Kock gets underneath this full ball and hoists it over extra-cover for another boundary
wide-of-the-crease delivery, glanced off the back foot behind square on the leg side

Hasan Ali pulls off a sharp catch in the outfield. Shinwari hits a hard length on off, de Kock goes for a pull and ends up splicing another one in the air. Hasan runs back and across to his left from midwicket and tracks the ball down. Hasan gives Pakistan some hope
short and nipping in from wide of the crease, Faf ducks into it, gets into a tangle, and is struck on the rib cage
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
wide of the crease, angling in keeps low and goes past the outside edge as Rassie plays for the angle but the ball straightens belatedly
this comes in with the angle, Rassie keeps it out
back of a length and spins away outside off, punched off back foot. Babar dives to his left at short cover and stops the ball
punched away to sweeper cover off the back foot
drifts in, takes the inside edge and rolls away to midwicket
full and angling in, nudged to midwicket
tossed outside off, Rassie lunges forward and drives down to long-off
shorter and outside off, stands tall and punches down to long-off
short and on off, jabbed to cover
short and banged down leg for a wide
full and largely holds its line outside off, Faf reaches out for a drive and is beaten in the channel
Usman hits the deck hard and draws a leading edge to cover
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off

full on the stumps, Rassie drills it gun-barrel straight, so much so it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end. Replays indicate Faf actually deflected the ball onto the stumps with his bat and tumbled
short and angling in at off, fended back
arm ball from Imad, nudged to the leg side with the incoming angle
floated up outside off, Rassie reaches the pitch of the ball and pilfers a single to extra-cover
slower through the air on off, opens the face and guides to cover
dropped shorter and spins away outside off, a back-foot punch to sweeper cover ensues
flighted on middle, played back to the bowler
full on middle, driven down to long-on
full on middle and leg, defended back
really full on middle, prodded to cover
shorter and outside off, hits the splice and wanders away to cover
full and angling into a front-foot push to extra-cover
full on middle and leg, worked away to midwicket's right. They get another run thanks to the overthrow
pitched up and outside off, Rassie leans into it and laces a drive to the left of extra cover and right of sweeper cover. Some tag-team work at the edge of the boundary keeps Rassie to three
straighter one on middle, dead-batted away by Rassie
shorter on middle and leg, Rassie hangs back and whips the ball away through the midwicket region
on a length and slides on outside off, Faf opens the face and pats it to cover-point
fuller on middle and leg, clipped away off the pads through square leg
shorter and outside off, Rassie leans back and crisply punches the ball away to the left of sweeper cover
length ball on off, Faf opens the face and steers the ball to cover
back of a length and breaks away outside off, cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover's left
googly, skids in on off, Faf keeps it out
flighted on off, Faf moves away and drives inside-out to long-off
shorter and spins away outside off, punched off the back foot behind square on the off side
straighter one on off, Rassie blocks to the off side
dangled up outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
chopped from off stump to Imam at sweeper cover
in-drifter from Imad, Faf drops it back to the bowler
full on off, Faf makes some room and drievs inside-out but can't get it past a prowling Babar at short cover
full on middle, played back to the bowler
Faf uses his feet and drives to Shadab at extra-cover, don't take on his arm
full on middle, eased down to long-on
flighted on middle, scooped away over the keeper's head
full on middle, down the track and driven to long-off
looped up outside off, caressed to sweeper cover
patted down to long-off
flighted on middle, driven down to long-off
short and outside off, chopped to sweeper cover off the back foot
sliding down the leg side, beats the flick, beats the keeper as well and rolls away towards fine leg
shorter and outside off, skips back and punches to sweeper cover
flat on middle, defended back to Imad
straight ball, dead-batted away
Rassie ventures down the track and belts a full ball down to long-on
shortish and outside off, Faf crashes it to sweeper cover off the back foot
drifting down the leg side, helped away fine on its way
back of a length on middle and leg, worked away through square leg for a hard-run two
bouncer on off, Faf ducks under it
full on the stumps, driven back
short and shoved down leg for a wide
full on the stumps, forced to mid-on
short and cramps Faf for room, hitting the thigh pad
back of a length and angling into a back-foot flick through square leg for one
full on middle, drifting into his toes. Driven down the ground to long on
full on middle, and clobbered over long on! Nonchalantly skips down the ground and deposits it this into the stands
length ball, wide outside off, and slapped off the front foot to deep extra cover
length ball, just wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep cover again
length ball, just wide outside off, and steered to point off the back foot
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
length ball, just outside off from round the wicket. Van der Dussen looks to fish at this, and the ball flies past his outside edge
length ball, but much wider outside off. Punched away to deep extra cover for a walking single
back of a length on off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball just outside off again, and Rassie misses the punch once more. Ball whizzes past his edge
length ball on off, and nudged off his hips to midwicket for a quick single
back of a length on middle, and he rides the bounce to work it towards the leg side for a quick single
full on off, and turning away. Defended with the bat's open face to short third man
length ball on middle, and he skips down the wicket before bat-padding a shot back to Shadab
full on off, and he drives with the turn. Falls just short of the diving cover fielder, and Imad from extra cover cleans up in the end
full on off, and turning away from Faf. Defended
full on off, and spinning away from the batsman. Driven off his toes to mid on
full just outside off, and turning away from the batsman. Pushed to cover for a quick single
length ball, wide outside off, and guided off the back foot to point. Shadab parries the ball towards third man as the batsmen come across for a single
back of a length just outside off, and steered off the back foot to point again
back of a length just outside off, and he punches off the back foot to cover
length ball on off, and angling into his body. Fended off the back foot to cover
length ball just outside off, and he tries to run this down fine. But it's been hit straight to point, and that means Faf must rush back into his crease
back of a length on off, and Faf swiftly ducks under the ball's line
full just outside off, and nudged away to cover
length ball just wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
full just outside off stump again, and defended away to cover
length ball, wide outside off and turning further away. Cut square to deep point
just a tad too full outside off, and he presses forward to hammer a drive through the infield! No chance for Imam at deep extra either
back of a length on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
back of a length just outside off, and he drags a pull to deep backward square for a walking single
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover
length ball on middle, and he allows the ball to get to him, before pulling along the ground - once again - to deep backward square
length ball on off stump, and he rocks back to fend towards the leg side
full on leg stump, and he takes a big stride forward to fend
full on middle, and turning away slightly. Blocked off the front foot
full and wide outside off, and he skips down the ground before hitting a beautiful straight drive right over the bowler's head. Picked the googly oh-so-well there
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
full on leg stump, and he meets this ball after skipping down the wicket. Drives to mid-on
full just outside off, and defended with the bat's open face to point
length ball, just wide outside off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side
back of a length just outside off, and the ball soars over his shoulder
full on off, and tapped down the ground to mid-on for a quick single
full on middle stump, and blocked away ... straight to the bowler
length ball, just wide outside off, and left alone
length ball, just outside off, and tapped away to cover once more
full just outside off, and he tries to drive through the covers. Outside-edge, and flies away to the third-man boundary
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot
full on off, and driven with the bat's open face to long off. Fifty for Faf
length ball, just outside off and turning further away
full just outside off, and driven away from cover to Fakhar at wide long-off
does it in style! Six over mid off for the youngster, and his third half-century of the series hands South Africa a seven-wicket win!
